New Records: India saw three batters out of their top four dismissed without scoring for the first time in ODIs
Key Match Events: Ishan Kishan was out for a golden duck in his World Cup debut
Rohit Sharma was out for 0 after facing 6 balls
Shreyas Iyer was also out for 0 as he hit one straight into the hands of the cover fielder
Virat Kohli and KL Rahul joined hands to redeem India's innings
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma also joined an unwanted list as he became the third India captain to get out for 0 in a World Cup match
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's batting show got off to a disastrous start in their World Cup 2023 campaign
Mitchell Starc and Josh Hazlewood combined to remove Rohit Sharma, Ishan Kishan and Shreyas Iyer for 0
India's top-order was reduced for 2 for 3 in the first 3 overs of the Indian chase
Others: Earlier in the day, Ravindra Jadeja shone with the ball, picking up 3 wickets as India bowled Australia out for 199
